title: Can I put 'a dollar from every sale will be donated to The Jed Foundation' or something similar on my book without their permission? - Quora

response.answer_text: U.S. Perspective: What you are describing is normally called either “cause related marketing” or a “commercial co-venture.” This is regulated by state law, and the rules vary widely from state to state. Some states, for example, will require a contract to be filed with the state charities regulator before any cause related marketing can take place, and since the contract needs to be signed by the nonprofit, its permission is really a precondition.
